name: 物理光學
description: 本課程銜接第1學期幾何光學課程內容,介紹與建立學生基礎的物理光學知識，使學生了解物理光學基本原理和應用，並作為未來光學實作與應用之入門工具與知識
syllabus:
【授課方式:16+2週】

**Week****週次**

**Content & Class Schedule (****教學進度****)**

1 (2/14)

Course Introduction and Overview (課程簡介與導覽)

Basic Mathematics & Physics of Optical Waves

(光波的基本數學與物理)

2 (2/21)

Coherence, Interference of Planewaves, and Dispersion

(同調性、平面波干涉、與色散)

3 (2/8)

**National Holliday**

4 (3/07)

Optical Interferometry, Interferometers, & Applications

(光波干涉學、干涉儀、與其應用)

5 (3/14)

**測驗** **(1):** **\[Test (1), 2 hours\];  Q&A on Test Problems {1 hour}**

6 (3/21)

Diffraction (I): Basic Concepts & Mathematics

(繞射的基本原理與數學)

7 (3/28)

Diffraction (II): Point-Spread Function and Diffraction–Limited Two-Point Resolution, Diffraction Gratings & Applications

繞射(二): 繞射極限解析度、繞射光柵、與其應用

8 (4/4)

**National Holliday**

9 (4/11)

**Mid-Term Exam (****期中測驗評量****)       \[3 hours\]**

10 (4/18)

Polarization Optics (I): Mathematical & Graphical

Representations of Polarization States (光波偏振態)

11 (4/25)

Polarization Optics (II): Jones Calculus & Polarizations Transformation (光波偏振態之調控轉換)

12 (5/02)

Polarization Optics (III): Applications (光波偏振態的應用)

13 (5/09)

**測驗** **(2):** **\[Test (2), 2 hours\];  Q&A on Test Problems {1 hour}**

14 (5/16)

Introduction to Photon Optics  光子學簡介

Elementary Laser Theory 雷射原理簡介(二)

15 (5/23)

Introduction to Holography  全像學簡介

16 (5/30)

**Final Exam (****期末測驗評量****)      \[3 hours\]**

17 -18(6/06、06/13)

**Reading Assignment & Report**  **論文導讀與報告**
